Load necessary packages.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```
Read the dataset and drop `NA` vlaues.
```{r}
youtube_df <- read_csv("Data/cleaned_youtube_df.csv")|>
  janitor::clean_names()|>
  drop_na()
```

```{r}
summary(youtube_df)
```
